mapper.insert: insert into course (subcategory_id, name, provider, description, difficulty, est_hour, website, video, assignment) values (#{subcategory_id}, #{name}, #{provider}, #{description}, #{difficulty}, #{est_hour}, #{website}, #{video}, #{assignment});
mapper.select: select pre_id from prerequisite where post_id=#{id};
select post_id from prerequisite where pre_id=#{id};
select * from prerequisite where post_id=#{post_id} and pre_id=#{pre_id};
mapper.delete: delete from prerequisite where pre_id=#{pre_id} and post_id=#{post_id};
delete from prerequisite where pre_id=#{id} or post_id=#{id};
mapper.select: select id, subcategory_id, name, provider, description, difficulty, est_hour from course order by id desc limit 6;

with hot as ( select course_id, count(*) as num from favorite group by course_id order by count(*) desc limit 6) select course.id, subcategory_id, name, provider, description, difficulty, est_hour from hot left join course on hot.course_id = course.id order by hot.num;

select id, subcategory_id, name, provider, description, difficulty, est_hour from course where id in
#{id}
select * from course where match (name, provider, description) against (#{keyword} in natural language mode);
